help-file.title: GROW
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Summoning
"Grow" allows the Druid to create forest in non-forest areas. Depending on the terrain, it takes different amounts of time for the forest to grow. In order to for this to work, you must have solid ground on which to the forest. Desert, water, mountains and indoor areas cannot be utilized.
